text: læa phwk khea ca khearph phakdi sing xun pi ca kxallxh thi midi hı thosʹ kæ phwk khea læa midi hı prayochn kæ phwk khea læa phwk khea ca klaw wa “hela ni khux phu chwyhelux rea n thi xallxh” cng klaw theid(muhammad) “phwk than cacæng khaw kæ xallxh dwy sing thi phraxngkh mi thrng ru nı brrda chan fa læa nı phændin kranan hrux? Phraxngkh thrng mha brisuththi læa thrng sungsng henux sing thi phwk khea tang phakhi khun”
